channel.title: Log in screen, Character, and Rules!
channel.description:
Hello again fellow server editors!
This time I would like to know the codes for...
[ul][li]When you log in it's a grey screen that shows the server information, instead of the text that's always at the top of the screen.[/li] [li]A code so that when you log in it automatically pops up the ::char command[/li] [li]and lastly, a code that makes it so that when you first join the server you have to type in commands before you can play (ex. ::rules)[/li][/ul]
Thank you very much, help is greatly appreciated =]

item.title: Log in screen, Character, and Rules!
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Double ban ahahahaha, not allowed to have more than one account.

Sin_, forgot flushOutStream…

public void Welcome() { sendQuest(" words ", 15950); sendQuest("words", 15959); sendQuest("", 15960); sendQuest("", 15961); sendQuest("words", 15951); sendQuest("words"15952); sendQuest("", 15953); sendQuest("", 15954); sendQuest("", 15955); showInterface(15944); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Log in screen, Character, and Rules!
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

1st Bullet:

  1. add this method:
public void Welcome()
{
sendQuest(" words ", 15950);
sendQuest("words", 15959);
sendQuest("", 15960);
sendQuest("", 15961);
sendQuest("words", 15951);
sendQuest("words"15952);
sendQuest("", 15953);
sendQuest("", 15954);
sendQuest("", 15955);
showInterface(15944);
}

And under process();
add:

Welcome();

Read full topic
